title.rendered: “Decoding IDF’s Latest Offensive: Targeted Strikes on Hezbollah in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

A terrorist squad, missile launch pad, military buildings, and terror infrastructures; IDF has completed a series of attacks in Lebanese territory.

Earlier today, Air Force fighter jets and additional IDF forces attacked a series of targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Ayta al-Shaab, Yaron, and Ramia in southern Lebanon. The targets attacked included a missile launch pad, military buildings, and terror infrastructures.

Also, earlier today, several launches were identified from the territory of Lebanon towards the areas of Metula and Margaliot. A UAV of the AirForce attacked a terrorist squad that fired towards the Metula area.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3vrI5e9

The targets attacked included a missile launch pad, military buildings, and terror infrastructures. Also, earlier today, several launches were identified from the territory of Lebanon towards the areas of Metula and Margaliot. A UAV of the AirForce attacked a terrorist squad that fired towards the Metula area. Attached
